name: Angela Henderson
text: I‚Äôve picked up from here several times since I deliver for door dash. Today I finally got my own masterpiece. My new favorite pizza. Cooked to perfection and an abundance of topping. Excellent customer service. Highly recommend                     üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

name: Sara Youngblood
text: I have ordered here quite a few times and every single time it hits the spot!! The owner, Carl, is an absolute sweetheart and has done a fantastic job with his restaurant. Next time you are in a pizza mood try palmetto pizza and I can promise that  you won‚Äôt be disappointed!

name: Taylor Garrett
text: Amazing pizza at a good price! Support local business!

name: secret life of breezy the bold BREEZY
text: I know the pizza is amazing because I work there. I'm not saying it's great because I work there I'm saying it because I have tried my weight in pizza and this is the best pizza ever the enchilada and taco pizzas are amazing. Very amazing ‚Ä¶More

name: Karmin Andrew
text: Totally surprised by excellent quality and abundance of toppings on a delicious crust. We will be back.

name: Benji Watkins
text: Completely disappointed this visit.  This used to be one of our favorite pizza places, but has fallen off the mark.  The guy at the register was completely unfriendly.  I ordered the chicken bacon ranch with no bell peppers and light ‚Ä¶More

name: Lawrence Bowers
text: Forgot how delicious these pizzas are, anyday a great price. Staff is very friendly, and fantastic atmosphere. The 7" is great for a personal meal. I tried the 7 rings of fire and the perfect amount of heat that I was looking for.  Being a ‚Ä¶More

name: Alivia Gould
text: So my boyfriend and I had walked in as the manager yelling at a waitress they had walked out crying and I personally think that it should have been taken care of in a different environment

name: Alexander George
text: Palmetto Pizza is amazing! The pizza and calzones are fresh and delicious.  I love the fact that they serve craft beer! This was our first visit. Rita and Carl made us feel at home. We'll be back soon!

name: Readawn Cummings
text: Love there pizza!! To me best in South Carolina!!

name: Ace Frill
text: Pizza and ingredients are very fresh and tasty. Hot subs are delicious as well and the selection of craft beer only made in South Carolina is wide. Only thing I would say, is their crust is sometimes on the thinner side for some people, I still love it with that little bit of a crunchyness in the crust, so I love it.

name: Jordan Nesbitt
text: Amazing pizza üî•üî•

name: chris marcus
text: First time eating there and it was fantastic

name: John Drew
text: Just moved from Indy to SC and looking to replace our favorite Indy Pizza provider, I'm sure we have found it.  Had lunch today and it was delicious, fresh ingredients and a great pie, friendly atmosphere.  We will be back a lot!

name: Katie Gay
text: The pizza was beyond the it's worth for the price. We ordered the Palmetto pizza there was so much toppings I enjoyed listening to my children giggle as they ate the pizza. Every one is nice and respectful.

name: Rob K. Block
text: Very high quality pizza! Almost like up north. Love it!

name: Matt#C1VB Jones
text: Me and my wife ate here for the 1st time tonight and it was very good. The staff was very nice and very friendly. She had the hand toss Supreme it was very good. I had the thin crust cheese , I'm a big fan of the thin crust and it was good. ‚Ä¶More

name: Hailey Franks
text: Just visited this place for the first time this week! The pizza here is sooooo good. Almost as good as Florida pizza! xoxoxo

name: James Gowan
text: Family run place.  Decent prices. Better than average food.  If you like spicy food try their "seven rings of fire" pizza.  NOT PRETEND SPICY. The real deal.

name: Jeffrey Bufton
text: The pizza and subs and salads are phenomenal. Try the italian sub. It is heated with melted cheese and a delicious dressing. You will thank me!

name: adam floyd
text: Best prices around the area for some really good pizza and calzones.  Great beverage variety and super fast and friendly service.  No delivery but doesn't matter, worth the trip.

name: Nick Newton
text: Pizza is always good but, lately has been slightly under cooked

name: Mike G
text: Great pizza. The seven rings of fire is an incredible assault on your taste buds. Highly recommended.

name: Penny Bartlett
text: Pizza to die for!!!!! The peeps are soooo nice! Love you guys

text: Good workers and good pizza but the blue cheese dressing is not that great

They hand make their dough every day!
You can taste the love they put into their food. Amazing.

name: Jessica Duval
text: We went into Palmetto Pizza last night, and i have got to say how GREAT the service was. The man, who i believe is the owner was so nice, and the pizza along with the cheese bread was also pretty good. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!
